item.title: A short reflection after writing my first, little Stan model
item.description: During my postdoc, I’ve resolved to better understand Bayesian statistics. This started a few years ago, when I organized a group of colleagues to painstakingly make our way through Statistical Rethinking.

item.title: Hire Me (as a Data Scientist!), Part IV
item.description: Since this is my last post in the beer review series, I’ll keep this short and sweet in terms of analysis.

item.title: Hire Me (as a Data Scientist!), Part III
item.description: Two questions down, two to go! For the third post I’ll explore the question:

item.title: Looking For Musicologists on Twitter
item.description: For the most part, Twitter is full of garbage. But I’m an optimist and a firm believer in Sturgeon’s Law so by that logic there must be some good on it.

item.title: Calculating iMultisets in R
item.description: November is pretty much the worst month for people in higher education.
